title: A vindication of Mr. James Colmar, Bachelor of Physick and Fellow of Exeter College in Oxford from the calumnies of three late pamphlets, 1. A paper publish'd by Dr. Bury, 1689, 2. The account examin'd, 3. The case of Exeter College related and vindicated : to which are annex'd the authentick copies of the affidavits relating to that affair.
author: Harrington, James, 1664-1693.
